title: Optimization
alt: Premature optimization is the root of all evil, so to start this project I'd better come up with a system that can determine whether a possible optimization is premature or not.
transcript:
[A flow chart is shown with three boxes connected with two arrows. The first box is rectangular:]
Are you prematurely optimizing or just taking time to do things right?[From the first box there is a short arrow straight down to a diamond shaped box:]
Are you consulting a flowchart to answer this question?[A labeled arrow continues down.]
Yes[The arrow connects to the final rectangular box.]
You are prematurely optimizing
